hopobject.name: LVDS LCD
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/535.7 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/16.0.912.75 Safari/535.7
hopobject.body: This small board is connected to two LCD headers on the bottom of BeagleBoard-xM (and original BeagleBoard), and provides simple interface to LVDS LCD panels like those you can find in notebooks. Schematic and Gerbers are available. Also, you can order bare PCB, fully assembled board or full bundle with LCD, touchscreen and ambient light sensor.
hopobject.shortdesc: Additional PCB to connect LVDS LCD panel to BeagleBoard and BeagleBoard-xM.
